content: We've scheduled a track touchpoint session at 10:00 AM CT (or immediately after our current session ends). This and other additional IPS sessions for today and tomorrow should be in Whova shortly.

Rob Hausam said:

We've scheduled a track touchpoint session at 10:00 AM CT (or immediately after our current session ends). This and other additional IPS sessions for today and tomorrow should be in Whova shortly.

Please @Rob Hausam could you confirmed the URL for access to this track, thanks

Here is the recording from the great presentations from UK NHSx, AWS and Patient Centric Solutions on IPS Workflow. Thanks to everyone who could join and participate: https://zoom.us/rec/share/PQxKqtBAmg6NPTkNtmsF95nMxnOFCS8onQ_vvjoH9tA0MHQSV_t4TRjExSMnj0M.sgAQ865p7ooAlb9-

In addition, during this session Jana from UK/NHS refers to G7 papers/policies on interoperability and IPS (just published December 30 2021!). Those can be accessed here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/g7-health-track-digital-health-final-reports
